title: Lifecycle Status
description: Lifecycle status summarizes the current status of the creation, approval, usage and archival actions for the entity that mixes in this schema. A lifecycle action was performed and the results are indicated with this type.

meta:enum.https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/common/event/dr: The subject of the lifecycle action is considered as not yet ready for approval.
meta:enum.https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/common/event/ap: The subject of the lifecycle action (approval process) is considered approved and ready to be used.
meta:enum.https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/common/event/re: The subject of the lifecycle action (approval process) is considered rejected and must be modified before it can be used.
meta:enum.https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/common/event/in: The subject of the lifecycle action is considered to be in use. Restrictions may apply how contributing entities can be altered.
meta:enum.https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/common/event/co: The subject of the lifecycle action is considered be completed or finished. Restrictions on how contributing entities can be altered may no longer apply.
meta:enum.https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/common/event/ar: The subject of the lifecycle action is considered be archived. The subject may be excluded from listing of entities.
